title: Serif+SansSerif+JeanLuc ID
content:
I apologize for the poor image quality, but could anyone tell me which fonts these are?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706083533im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/serif_4890.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706083533im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sansserif_6632.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706083533im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/jeanluc_6086.jpg)

 [‹ Serif font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706083533/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40933 "Go to previous forum topic") [please id these!! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706083533/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40908 "Go to next forum topic")
author: oodko

comments.content: Well, the “PASSIONS” one is a horizontally distorted [ITC Avant Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706083533/http:/www.linotype.com/563/itcavantgardegothicbyadobe-family.html). I’d be curious to find out the bottom one actually.
The bottom one reminds me of [Aurora](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706083533/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/aurora_bold_condensed/).
Thanks everyone! Yeah the first two are work related, but I was personally curious about the Jean-Luc typeface.
